attributes.action: Ensure the grants, loans and fees for study fair for all UK undergraduates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair that English students are being forced to finish university with more debt than other UK students due to the unfair higher education finance system.  
The government has created a postcode lottery for the future UK professional workforce.

There has been no increase in funds to take into account the rise in living costs and parents are having to subsidise their children whether they can afford it or not.

The system of  finance should be fair for all UK higher education students.
